output.name: EmeraldCanopyRoot
output.description: Emerald Canopy Root is the leading end-to-end reforestation company in the U.S., dedicated to making reforestation scalable and accessible, especially in the wake of increased wildfires. By removing barriers in financial support and seed supply, they provide high-quality forest restoration services to landowners at no cost. As the largest seed bank and reforestation container stock producer in the Western U.S., Root collaborates with trusted forestry partners to innovate within the non-timber forestry supply chain. Their mission is not just about planting trees but fostering long-term ecological health and resilience.
